Name: Name
showTabBarDescription: Controls whether the tab bar is visible or not
tabBarPositionDescription: Controls where the tab bar is positioned
promptWhenClosingTabDescription: When enabled, you will be prompted when you close a tab
launchMinimizedDescription: When enabled, the app will start minimized
rememberWindowSizeDescription: When enabled, Altus will remember the size of the window from previous use
rememberWindowPositionDescription: When enabled, Altus will remember the position of the window from previous use
preventEnterDescription: When enabled, pressing Enter while typing will not send the message and add a new line instead
customTitlebarDescription: When enabled, Altus will use a custom titlebar instead of the one provided by the system. (NOTE: Requires a restart for changes to apply.)
autoHideMenuBarDescription: When enabled, the menu bar will only show when you press the Alt key
trayIconDescription: Controls whether the tray icon is visible or not
closeToTrayDescription: When enabled, Altus will be minimized to the tray instead of being closed completely
exitPromptDescription: When enabled, you will be prompted when you close the app
autoLaunchDescription: When enabled, Altus will launch whenever you start your system.
showSaveDialogDescription: Whether to ask where to save each file before downloading. (NOTE: Requires a restart for changes to apply.)
defaultDownloadDirDescription: The directory where you want to save the downloads. (NOTE: Requires an absolute path)
deleteThemeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this theme?
